# YallaFoot - Football Streaming Links Curation Platform

## Project Overview
YallaFoot is a modern web application for curating and reviewing football streaming links with excellent SEO optimization and user engagement features.

## Technology Stack
- **Framework**: Next.js 14 with App Router
- **Styling**: Tailwind CSS
- **Database**: JSON files (can be upgraded to database later)
- **Deployment**: Netlify
- **SEO**: Next.js built-in SEO optimization

## Key Features
- Link curation system for football matches
- User review and rating system
- SEO-optimized pages for search visibility
- Responsive design for mobile and desktop
- Legal disclaimers and compliance
- Fast loading with static generation

## Development Guidelines
- Use semantic HTML for better SEO
- Implement proper meta tags and structured data
- Ensure mobile-first responsive design
- Follow accessibility best practices
- Use TypeScript for type safety
- Implement proper error handling

## Deployment
- Optimized for Netlify hosting
- Static site generation for better performance
- Environment variables for configuration
